amendment.description: To name the CVN-78 aircraft carrier the U.S.S. Gerald Ford.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4211 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4211 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S5744-5746; text: CR S5744-5745) To name the CVN-78 aircraft carrier the U.S.S. Gerald Ford.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4211 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
